headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Donâ€™t get caught lacking, especially when it comes to underwater warfare. Take advantage of upgrade deals for your Kosatka submarine and fill the Moon Pool with discounts on vehicles like the Kraken Avisa and Sparrow helicopter, among others.

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
